features.name: Elemental Breath
features.text: Breath costs an Action; cone 6m/20ft; attack roll vs all targets; damage/condition determined by subrace; scaling per level.

features.name: Draconic Resistance
features.text: Resistance is determined by Dragonborn subrace; improves to immunity at character level 9.

features.name: Shrouded Advantage
features.text: While shrouded in total darkness, Drow make all Attack Rolls with Advantage.

features.name: Superior Darkvision
features.text: All Drow gain Superior Darkvision; can see in magical darkness.

features.name: Proficiency Strike
features.text: When making any Attack Roll, add your Proficiency Bonus to the roll twice.

features.name: Initiative Bonus
features.text: All Half-Elves gain a +1 bonus to Initiative.

features.name: Initiative Bonus
features.text: Gain a +1 bonus to Initiative.

features.name: Strength Advantage
features.text: Advantage on all Strength based Ability Checks.

features.name: Initiative Bonus
features.text: Gain a +2 bonus to Initiative.

features.name: Darkvision
features.text: Tieflings gain Basic Darkvision.

features.name: Fire Resistance
features.text: Tieflings gain Resistance to Fire.

features.name: Amethyst Dragonborn Breath
features.text: Breath deals Force damage and inflicts the Dazed condition.

features.name: Amethyst Dragonborn Resistance
features.text: Gain Resistance to Force damage.

features.name: Crystal Dragonborn Breath
features.text: Breath deals Radiant damage and inflicts the Blinded condition.

features.name: Crystal Dragonborn Resistance
features.text: Gaint Resistance to Radiant damage.

features.name: Black Dragonborn Breath
features.text: Breath deals Acid elemental damage and inflicts the Acid condition.

features.name: Black Dragonborn Resistance
features.text: Gain Resistance to Acid damage.

features.name: Blue Dragonborn Breath
features.text: Breath deals Lightning elemental damage and inflicts the Shocked condition.

features.name: Blue Dragonborn Resistance
features.text: Gain Resistance to Lightning damage.

features.name: Brass Dragonborn Breath
features.text: Breath deals Fire elemental damage and inflicts the Burning condition.

features.name: Brass Dragonborn Resistance
features.text: Gain Resistance to Fire damage.

features.name: Bronze Dragonborn Breath
features.text: Breath deals Lightning elemental damage and inflicts the Shocked condition.

features.name: Bronze Dragonborn Resistance
features.text: Gain Resistance to Lightning damage.

features.name: Copper Dragonborn Breath
features.text: Breath deals Acid elemental damage and inflicts the Acid condition.

features.name: Copper Dragonborn Resistance
features.text: Gain Resistance to Acid damage.

features.name: Gold Dragonborn Breath
features.text: Breath deals Fire elemental damage and inflicts the Burning condition.

features.name: Gold Dragonborn Resistance
features.text: Gain Resistance to Fire damage.

features.name: Green Dragonborn Breath
features.text: Breath deals Poison elemental damage and inflicts the Poisoned condition.

features.name: Green Dragonborn Resistance
features.text: Gain Resistance to Poison damage.

features.name: Red Dragonborn Breath
features.text: Breath deals Fire elemental damage and inflicts the Burning condition.

features.name: Red Dragonborn Resistance
features.text: Gain Resistance to Fire damage.

features.name: Silver Dragonborn Breath
features.text: Breath deals Cold elemental damage and inflicts the Frostbite condition.

features.name: Silver Dragonborn Resistance
features.text: Gain Resistance to Cold damage.

features.name: White Dragonborn Breath
features.text: Breath deals Cold elemental damage and inflicts the Frostbite condition.

features.name: White Dragonborn Resistance
features.text: Gain Resistance to Cold damage.

features.name: Silence
features.text: Cast Silence as an Action once per combat.

features.name: Misty Step
features.text: Cast Misty Step as a Bonus Action once per combat.

features.name: Shrouded Advantage
features.text: While shrouded in total darkness, Duergar make all Attack Rolls with Advantage.

features.name: Enlarge
features.text: Cast Enlarge on yourself as a Bonus Action once per combat.

features.name: Superior Darkvision
features.text: Duergar gain Superior Darkvision; can see in magical darkness.

features.name: Weapon Damage Bonus
features.text: Gain a +2 bonus to all damage dealt with weapons (not unarmed).

features.name: Damage Reduction
features.text: Reduce all damage taken by 2 (after resistances; stacks with other DR).

features.name: Wisdom Advantage
features.text: Gain Advantage on all Wisdom based Ability Checks and Saving Throws.

features.name: Increased Movement
features.text: Movement speed is increased by 6m/20ft.

features.name: Emerald Dragonborn Breath
features.text: Breath deals Psychic damage and inflicts the Mental Fatigue condition.

features.name: Emerald Dragonborn Resistance
features.text: Gain Resistance to Psychic damage.

features.name: Shrouded Advantage
features.text: While shrouded in total darkness, Deep Gnomes make all Attack Rolls with Advantage.

features.name: Invisibility
features.text: Cast Invisibility on yourself as a Bonus Action once per combat.

features.name: Superior Darkvision
features.text: Deep Gnomes gain Superior Darkvision; can see in magical darkness.

features.name: Dominate Beast
features.text: Cast Dominate Beast as an Action once per combat.

features.name: Speak With Animals
features.text: Forest Gnomes can Speak With Animals at all times.

features.name: Armour Class Bonus
features.text: Armour Class is increased by 2.

features.name: Shrouded Advantage
features.text: While shrouded in total darkness, Drow Half-Elves make all Attack Rolls with Advantage.

features.name: Superior Darkvision
features.text: Drow Half-Elves gain Superior Darkvision; can see in magical darkness.

features.name: Wisdom Advantage
features.text: Gain Advantage on all Wisdom based Ability Checks.

features.name: Increased Movement
features.text: Movement speed is increased by 3m/10ft.

features.name: Dexterity Advantage
features.text: Gain Advantage on all Dexterity based Ability Checks and Saving Throws.

features.name: Constitution Advantage
features.text: Gain Advantage on all Constitution based Ability Checks and Saving Throws.

features.name: Sapphire Dragonborn Breath
features.text: Breath deals Thunder damage and inflicts the Reverberation condition.

features.name: Sapphire Dragonborn Resistance
features.text: Gain Resistance to Psychic damage.

features.name: Scorching Ray
features.text: Cast Scorching Ray as an Action once per combat. Spell scales with character level (treated as higher slot at level 3 and every odd level thereafter).

features.name: Burning Hands
features.text: Cast Burning Hands as an Action once per combat. Spell scales with character level (treated as higher slot at level 3 and every odd level thereafter).

features.name: Heat Metal
features.text: Cast Heat Metal as an Action once per combat. Spell scales with character level (treated as higher slot at level 3 and every odd level thereafter).

features.name: Topaz Dragonborn Breath
features.text: Breath deals Necrotic damage and inflicts the Bone Chilled condition.

features.name: Topaz Dragonborn Resistance
features.text: Gain Resistance to Necrotic damage.
